original_title: The 1992 Shoji Tabuchi Family Christmas Show
overview: In celebration of that most special time of the year Shoji, Dorothy and Christina Tabuchi bring you all the joy and wonder of Christmas. From the violin artistry and incredible versatility of Shoji, to the production genius of the show's creator and vivacious emcee Dorothy, to the rising star that is Christina, here is the holiday show you'll never forget.
title: The 1992 Shoji Tabuchi Family Christmas Show
